last_episode_to_air.name: University city
last_episode_to_air.overview: Laura finishes her Serbian trip in the north of the country at the university city of Novi Sad. With it's modern offerings, deep culture and historical sites there is still so much to see and do.

name: Serbia Old and New
overview: Join Laura Alexandra as she travels Serbia for the first time in this 6 part series. Serbia has connected West with East for centuries - a land in which civilizations, cultures, faiths, climates and landscapes meet and mingle - and Laura experiences just some of these offerings in this travel series.

episodes.name: Belgrade - Part 1
episodes.overview: Join Laura Alexandra as she travels the European country of Serbia to discover culture, history, food and the great outdoors. Laura starts her Serbian adventure in capital city Belgrade.

episodes.name: Belgrade - Part 2
episodes.overview: Laura Alexandra continues her travels across Serbia. She is still exploring Belgrade, this time experiencing art, medicine, and fashion. She also meets the Crown Prince and Princess.

episodes.name: The Roman Trail
episodes.overview: Having explored Serbia's capital city, Laura Alexandra travels into the countryside in pursuit of an old Roman trail. Her journey will take her back and forth through 1 million years of history.

episodes.name: Devil's Town
episodes.overview: Laura Alexandra continues her historical tour of Serbia. As the Roman trail approaches natural Spa's Laura enjoys a well-earned rest, after visiting the national landmark Devil's Town.

episodes.name: Purest Air
episodes.overview: After a trumpeting experience by the lake Laura arrives in the mountainous spa area known as Zlatibor where she experiences some thrills in the crisp clear mountain air.

episodes.name: University city
episodes.overview: Laura finishes her Serbian trip in the north of the country at the university city of Novi Sad. With it's modern offerings, deep culture and historical sites there is still so much to see and do.
